sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for measuring conductivity of solutions.
sections.scope: Applicable to conductivity measurements in Pharmaceutical Analysis laboratory.
procedure: Calibrate the instrument using standard conductivity solution.
Rinse the probe with distilled water.
Immerse the probe in the sample solution.
Clean and store the probe after use.
sections.precautions: Avoid air bubbles around the probe. Clean the probe after each measurement.
